issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS, Base UI>Views>Web Views>HTML5 Video, I could not get the video to play in either 1.7.0 or 1.6.2. This test worked fine on the iPad 2.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on iPad 1
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Web Views>HTML5 Video
3) Tap the movie


Result:
The movie does not play. You may see a quick flash of the play arrow icon overlay the movie, but it quickly disappears.

Expected Result:
The movie plays

Notes:
OCCURS on 1.6.2
DOES NOT OCCUR on iPad 2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink:  Base UI>Views>Web Views>HTML5 Video will not play on iPad 1
fields.environment: iPad 1 (3.2.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
